name: The Disappearing Act
description:
You are in a maze, but not just any maze because this maze isn't real. It's in a dream, nothing makes sense. As soon as you take your eye away from the exit, it moves away from you! What will you do?

Download if u can because that version has better lighting and stuff, and the game was originally made to be downloaded, but playing in the browser is better if u don't have much time or something.

Controls:

WASD - movement (obviously)

Arrow keys - Navigating menus

Left click - Throw camera

Right click - Retrieve camera

R - Reset cube position

Cool Polaroid model by Jackmcm on SketchFab (Creative Commons). Sadly not this good at 3d modeling myself :(
